mapper.sql: a.owid AS "owid", a.fid AS "fid", a.path AS "path", a.cc AS "cc", a.px AS "px", a.xxbh AS "xxbh", a.bknd AS "bknd", a.type AS "type", a.code AS "code", a.name AS "name", a.content AS "content", a.attach_file AS "attachFile", a.xgyy AS "xgyy", a.memo AS "memo", a.createtime AS "createtime", a.creator AS "creator", a.creator_name AS "creatorName", a.lastupdate AS "lastupdate", a.updator AS "updator", a.updator_name AS "updatorName", a.ver AS "ver", a.vertime AS "vertime", a.dept_id AS "deptId", a.dept_path AS "deptPath", a.delflg AS "delflg", a.state AS "state", a.exp1 AS "exp1", a.exp2 AS "exp2", a.exp3 AS "exp3", a.exp4 AS "exp4", a.exp5 AS "exp5", a.exp6 AS "exp6", a.exp7 AS "exp7", a.exp8 AS "exp8", a.exp9 AS "exp9", a.exp10 AS "exp10"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM bckj_biz_bkzy a
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}

SELECT
FROM bckj_biz_bkzy a
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bckj_biz_bkzy( owid, fid, path, cc, px, xxbh, bknd, type, code, name, content, attach_file, xgyy, memo, createtime, creator, creator_name, lastupdate, updator, updator_name, ver, vertime, dept_id, dept_path, delflg, state, exp1, exp2, exp3, exp4, exp5, exp6, exp7, exp8, exp9, exp10 ) VALUES ( #{owid}, #{fid}, #{path}, #{cc}, #{px}, #{xxbh}, #{bknd}, #{type}, #{code}, #{name}, #{content}, #{attachFile}, #{xgyy}, #{memo}, #{createtime}, #{creator}, #{creatorName}, #{lastupdate}, #{updator}, #{updatorName}, #{ver}, #{vertime}, #{deptId}, #{deptPath}, #{delflg}, #{state}, #{exp1}, #{exp2}, #{exp3}, #{exp4}, #{exp5}, #{exp6}, #{exp7}, #{exp8}, #{exp9}, #{exp10} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bckj_biz_bkzy SET owid = #{owid}, fid = #{fid}, path = #{path}, cc = #{cc}, px = #{px}, xxbh = #{xxbh}, bknd = #{bknd}, type = #{type}, code = #{code}, name = #{name}, content = #{content}, attach_file = #{attachFile}, xgyy = #{xgyy}, memo = #{memo}, createtime = #{createtime}, creator = #{creator}, creator_name = #{creatorName}, lastupdate = #{lastupdate}, updator = #{updator}, updator_name = #{updatorName}, ver = #{ver}, vertime = #{vertime}, dept_id = #{deptId}, dept_path = #{deptPath}, delflg = #{delflg}, state = #{state}, exp1 = #{exp1}, exp2 = #{exp2}, exp3 = #{exp3}, exp4 = #{exp4}, exp5 = #{exp5}, exp6 = #{exp6}, exp7 = #{exp7}, exp8 = #{exp8}, exp9 = #{exp9}, exp10 = #{exp10} WHERE owid = #{owid}
